c-0: ^Steven` Yeah, Reginald. I-yeah he's the Ring Master.
^He is, did you think you were?
^Steven` I was... I had been the Ring Master for years. But I don't think I actually was.
^Steven` My memory just got wacky for a bit.
^Well, things are back to normal now.
^Steven` Yeah, normal. I think I might be okay with that for now.
